main.name: Zahra Bodaghi-Ginns
main.description: I am a persistent and ambitious developer...
main.bio: I am a persistent and ambitious developer who enjoys overcoming technical challenges. I am eager to learn new programming languages, platforms, and in general, anything related to technology.
main.bio2: I am currently a senior in the college of computer science at the University of Houston pursuing an undergraduate degree. I balance working individually and in a team under pressure by being super organized and goal-oriented.
main.goal: I am seeking full time software engineering opportunites for December 2021.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me for any job opportunity related to computer science. Also, if you have any suggestions/recommendations to improve my website feel free to write me a message here.
